word: Well now, here we are, little companies in different places getting ready for the coming of our Lord. You cannot have a minister with you in all these places. You want, every one of you, to pray the God of heaven to enlighten you so that you can be a help to one another, building up one another in the most holy faith. You must say, "We will not keep the minister with us, but let him go out and enlighten others." But you can have Bible readings among yourselves, and search the Scriptures and pray to God in faith, believing that He will answer you.
